Ordered pair membership in a Cartesian product.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

 Ordered pair membership in a cross product.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
statement: opelxp $p |- ( <. A , B >. e. ( C X. D ) <-> ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) ) $.
